description: Iterates over every entry of the Struct and calls the closure function to work on the key value pair of the struct. The returned value will be set for the same key in a new struct and the new struct will be returned.
name: structMap

params.description:
Closure or a function reference that will be called for each of the iteration. The arguments passed to the callback are

key: key for the current iteration
value: the value for the current iteration
struct: a reference of the original struct
params.name: function

examples.title: Script Syntax
Using Member Function
